    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet FormOfPayment_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormOfPayment costCenterID="Example String Value" guaranteeID="Example String Value" guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" objID="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" remark="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <FormOfPaymentRef>formOfPayment_1</FormOfPaymentRef>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <GuaranteeTypeCode>Air travel card</GuaranteeTypeCode>
</FormOfPayment>

      Example JSON

      {
  "FormOfPaymentSummary" : {
    "objID" : "formOfPayment_1",
    "costCenterID" : "Example String Value",
    "paymentTransactionTypeCode" : "charge",
    "guaranteeID" : "Example String Value",
    "remark" : "Example String Value",
    "guaranteeIndicatorInd" : true,
    "Identifier" : {
      "value" : "guid12345",
      "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "system" : "sysABC3344",
      "organization" : "Acme"
    },
    "FormOfPaymentRef" : "formOfPayment_1",
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    },
    "GuaranteeTypeCode" : {
      "value" : "Air travel card"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Privacy
        Data use and sharing permissions.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        GuaranteeTypeCode
        Used to specify the method of guarantee. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Payment Type (PMT).
        Details
        Type PaymentType_Enum
        Example Value Air travel card
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID

        Identifier, FormOfPaymentRef

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        costCenterID
        A reference to identify the billing department for allocating cost of travel to company account.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        paymentTransactionTypeCode
        This is used to indicate either a charge, reserve (deposit) or refund.
        Details
        Type PaymentTransactionType_Enum
        Example Value charge
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        guaranteeID
        Provides the identifier as specified by the GuaranteeTypeCode (e.g., Corporate ID or IATA number).
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        remark
        A remark associated with the payment form.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID

        objID

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        guaranteeIndicatorInd
        When true, indicates this represents a guarantee rather than a payment form.
